handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive destination analysis for Thailand autumn travel campaign. All four analysis blocks and actionable insights prepared.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use destination and market analysis, emotional profile and trends for creation of impactful and visually engaging travel content. Emphasize warm, emotional escapes from Russian autumn, and blend Kupibilet brand colors with Thailand tropical palette for visual identity.
recommendations: Фокус на эмоциональном побеге от осени
Акцентировать цветовую и визуальную гармонию с брендом
Поддержать индивидуальные туры и массовый спрос
